house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1952 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 1 car attached garage and approximately 3541 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private spa, air conditioning, french doors.
house_listing.firm_name: J.H. Walton Realty Lic. Real Estate Broker

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Den, Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Dishwasher, Foyer, French Doors, Kitchen Island, Outdoor Lights
